text.text_translated:
There is a story you see many times in horror films.
This story was very popular in older films.
It starts with a group of young people.
They are all happy and having fun.
But at the end, everyone is dead.
Only one girl is alive.
At the start of the film, this girl is good and shy.
She is not very strong.
But at the end, she changes.
She becomes the strongest and cleverest person.
This last girl usually wins.
